Flexible Financing That Fits Your Needs

Choose from fixed or floating-rate loans with flexible terms that work for you.

Fixed-Rate Loans

Enjoy fixed payments that never change plus the benefits of extended amortization

5-, 7- and 10-year term
30-year amortization


Hybrid ARM Loans

Get the lowest rates during an initial fixed-rate term, then periodic adjustments based on LIBOR

5-, 7- or 10-year initial fixed rate period
20-year amortization

We Make It Fast and Easy

Our straightforward process eliminates headaches and hassles that can slow you down.

1

Quote

Fill out an application with an approved lender. They'll provide a simple coupon quote, which can be locked until closing.

2

Underwrite

Your lender completes due diligence and sends your loan to us for approval. No cookie-cutters here; we review each loan and provide creative solutions for unique or complex transactions

3

Close

Once approved, you sign a commitment letter that outlines terms. Then, set a date to close.

Request A Quote

The Freddie Mac Difference

We are the leader in multifamily financing. Whether you want to grow your portfolio, improve performance or meet other goals, we can get you there.

Strength

We've funded over $6 billion in small loans, offering the best terms and choice nationwide.

Reliability

We oversee servicing on each loan to ensure you get the attention you deserve.

Commitment

Once approved, you sign a commitment letter that outlines terms. Then, set a date to close.

Our Lenders

Pinnacle Financial Partners offers a streamlined execution for apartment loans that help provide liquidity, stability and certainty of execution to the affordable rental housing market.

CBRE brings local market expertise and experience to the table. They provide unique solutions for small balance investors with their underwriting, closing and servicing departments. CBRE offers Freddie Mac loans throughout the country.

Go to this lender's website

Community Preservation Cooperation offers flexible terms and prepayment options, competitive low rates, and streamlined pricing, underwriting, closing, and funding process.

Go to this lender's website

Arbor has a long-established presence in the small loans market, offering personalized service, flexible terms and certainty of execution. Arbor provides Freddie Mac loans for properties in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut.

Go to this lender's website

Greystone provides reliable and fast apartment building loans with competitive rates and fee structures.

Go to this lender's website

Capital One Multifamily Finance provides a full range of competitively priced mortgage products for the acquisition, refinancing and rehabilitation of multifamily high-rises and communities. Capital One Multifamily offers Freddie Mac financing extensively in the Northeast, Southeast, and West Coast.

Go to this lender's website

Hunt Mortgage Group is committed to speed and innovation with small properties. Their in-market experts can deliver flexible solutions that simplify due diligence and loan documents.

Go to this lender's website

Red Capital Group offers a streamlined small balance loan documentation and processing from pricing to underwriting and closing.

Go to this lender's website

PennyMac offers highly competitive rates on small balance multifamily loans nationwide for purchase, refinances or cash-outs. They provide tailored service to help your loan close.

Go to this lender's website

Sabal originates loans through a trusted network of brokers who work directly with borrowers. SNAP, their secure online platform, provides instant access to quotes and loan documents.

Go to this lender's website

ReadyCap specializes in small balance properties, offering a diverse array of loan products with efficient process and closings. They work with brokers, bankers and borrowers directly to find unique financing solutions for commercial real estate.
